text:
jakarta-commons/net has been enhanced as of release 1.2.1 to be able to get FTP
listings for more than just unix ftp servers.  This change has been brewing for
awhile, but the documentation does not reflect this.  I am about to submit a
patch to the documentation to remedy this.
creator: scohen@apache.org
scohen@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 11715
patches to documentation to reflect latest ftp task requirements and capabilities
